One usually sets object properties using g_object_set (). The problem with this method is that you need to know the type of the property. A convenience function, gst_utils_set_object_arg () is therefore provided so that you can always set the property with a string value. for example:
Will do The Right Thing(tm), converting the string to the type of the property when needed.

There is also another utility function that can be used to dump a block of memory on the console. This function is very usefull for plugin developers. The function will dump size bytes of the memory pointed to by mem.
